programme.title: Stree
programme.desc: (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Bandhan
programme.desc: Pooja and her young brother Raju are inseparable. When Thakur Suraj Pratap marries Pooja, they decide to take Raju along with them. Raju and Jyoti, Suraj Pratap's younger sister, grow up together and fall in love. However, tragedy strikes when Suraj Pratap meets Vaishali, a stunning courtesan, and decides to make her his mistress. Raju decides to fight for his sister. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: MCA Middle Class Abbayi
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Dulhan Hum Le Jayenge
programme.desc: Sapna is brought up by her three eccentric uncles, Bhola Nath, Prabhu Nath and Vicky Nath, after her parents' death. Prabhu is God-fearing and dedicates most of his time worshipping God, whereas Bhola is athletic and spends his time weightlifting. Vicky, on the other hand, is very lively and loves to dance. After Sapna has had enough of their possessive natures, she secretly takes a trip to Europe with a tour group. She meets Raja Oberoi on the trip and the two soon fall in love. They decide to get married when they return. Her uncles disapprove of her relationship with Raja because of an argument they had with Raja's father in the past. Raja doesn't give up and attempts to impress her uncles. (Film - Rom-Com)

programme.title: Mawali Raaj
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Mardaani 2
programme.desc: Sunny, a psychopath working for a politician, brutally rapes and murders innocent women, leaving a trail of battered bodies in his wake. However, SP Shivani Roy vows to catch and bring him to justice. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Mission Mangal
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Prague
programme.desc: Chandan, an architect, travels to Prague for a project and falls in love with a local woman named Elena. At the same time, he struggles to deal with his past and overcome his growing insecurities. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: Do Knot Disturb
programme.desc: Raj is a rich businessman and is married to Kiran. However, Kiran suspects Raj of having an affair with a model, Dolly. She hires a detective to keep an eye on Raj and update her about Raj's whereabouts. Raj, in turn, hires a waiter and asks him to pretend to be Dolly's boyfriend. Dolly is also being stalked by a jealous lover. Raj's efforts to camouflage his affair with the model go in vain. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Welcome To Sajjanpur
programme.desc: Mahadev, an unemployed graduate, is forced to make a living off writing letters for his uneducated villagers. He wishes to be a novelist but soon discovers that his humble job can change many lives. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Road to Sangam
programme.desc: Hasmat, a devout Muslim Indian man, is tasked with repairing a lorry in order to transport the ashes of Mahatma Gandhi. However, when communal violence strikes, he is left with a troubling dilemma. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Love Sonia
programme.desc: When Sonia's debt-ridden father sells her sister, she sets out on a journey hoping to rescue her. Sonia's life takes an unusual turn when she gets trapped in the world of flesh trade. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Ribbon
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Dhoondte Reh Jaoge
programme.desc: Raj, a director, and Anand, a chartered accountant, borrow money from gangsters to make a movie. However, they must ensure that the movie is unsuccessful in order to flee with the money. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Raavan
programme.desc: A bandit kidnaps an officer's wife, falls in love with her and lets her go, only to realise that she is in love with him. Realising this, her own husband uses her as a scapegoat to reach the bandit. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Aetbaar
programme.desc: After the death of his son, Dr. Malhotra (Amitabh Bachchan) becomes extremely possessive of his daughter, Ria (Bipasha Basu). When she falls in love with Aryan (John Abraham), a man who is wild, unpredictable, and obsessive, Dr. Malhotra tries to convince Ria that she is headed for disaster. But both Ria and Aryan will stop at nothing to be with each other. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Kahaani
programme.desc: Vidya Bagchi, a pregnant woman, travels to Kolkata from London to search for her missing husband. When all clues lead to a dead end, she realises that there is more than what meets the eye. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: Why Cheat India
programme.desc: Rakesh Singh, a corrupt man, lures Sattu, a brilliant student, into writing the exam papers of rich candidates in exchange for money. He then grows up to be a con artist and leads a corrupt life. (Film - Crime)

programme.title: VIP 2: Lalkar
programme.desc: (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Vardi Ka Dum
programme.desc: Subhash, a daredevil officer, raises his voice against injustice when he comes across a few politically influential people. However, when his family is brutally murdered, he sets out to exact revenge. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Aksar
programme.desc: Rajveer cannot divorce his possessive wife Sheena due to an expensive pre-nuptial agreement. However, when he hires Ricky to seduce and get rid of her, his plan backfires with serious consequences. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: Fruit & Nut
programme.desc: (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Fukrey
programme.desc: Hunny, Choocha, Lali and Zafar want to make easy money and approach the notorious Bholi to invest in their plan. But when they lose her money, they must come up with a plan or face the consequences. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Ghatotkacha
programme.desc: (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Jodi No 1
programme.desc: Best friends Jay and Veeru are small-time crooks and are on the run from a local goon. Their next target is Raisaab, a wealthy businessman who they intend to con for his riches. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: The Real Jackpot
programme.desc: Gautham, a young man, who works as a security guard, stumbles upon the will left by his grandfather. The will states that his grandfather was a rich and prosperous diamond merchant living in Pakistan before the partition of the country. He hid 900 precious gems in an ancient temple, before escaping to India, after the partition. He travels across the border to claim his inheritance. Sultan, an evil man stops him from claiming possession of what rightly belongs to him. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Paap Ki Kamai
programme.desc: Tamizh's life turns on its head after his father commits suicide. Later, a distressed Tamizh vows to uncover the reason that prompted his father to take his own life. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Golmaal 3
programme.desc: From the most celebrated director of action comedy, Rohit Shetty, comes another light-hearted, fun and mirthful instalment of the 'Golmaal' franchise which sees the return of Ajay Devgn, Kareena Kapoor and Arshad Warsi amidst the breathtaking locales of Goa where Geeta (Ratna Pathak Shah) and Pritam (Mithun Chakraborty) try to rekindle their old spark after several years, but to their despair, their children become the obstacles in their love story. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Makkhi
programme.desc: Sudeep is a shrewd business man and a womaniser. He sets his eyes on Bindhu who runs a non-profit organisation. However, Nani loves Bindhu and follows her everywhere. Bindhu is also in love with Nani but does not express her love to him and enjoys his attention. In the meantime, Sudeep gets to know about Nani's love for Bindhu and eventually kills him. Soon, Nani is reincarnated as a housefly to avenge his death and protect Bindhu. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Deadpool 2
programme.desc: Wade Wilson AKA Deadpool learns what it means to have a family as he attempts to save Russell, an orphaned mutant, who is being hunted by Cable, a genetically enhanced soldier from the future trying to prevent the death of his wife and daughter. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: Keeping with his famous trend of aestheticizing violence, Quentin Tarantino brings a war film starring Brad Pitt, Christoph Waltz and Melanie Laurent. Set in the backdrop of World War II, 'Inglourious Basterds' traverses the scheming and plotting of two groups that aim to assassinate prominent Nazi political leaders. But a single night changes the fate of everyone involved when the two groups cross each other's paths. (Film - War)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A compilation of snippets of movies and behind-the-scene moments of films where the cast and crew share their on-set experiences. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A compilation of snippets of movies and behind-the-scene moments of films where the cast and crew share their on-set experiences. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Tim Burton's The Nightmare Before Christmas
programme.desc: Jack Skellington, a being from Halloween Town, finds Christmas Town and is instantly enchanted. The situation becomes riveting when his obsession with Christmas leads him to abduct Santa Claus. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Ant-Man
programme.desc: Based on a Marvel Comics character, 'Ant-Man' has Paul Rudd playing the superhero whose suit gives him the power to shrink in size. He is tasked with using his abilities to stop Darren from creating a destructive weapon with the same technology. (Film - Action)

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon 2
programme.desc: Hiccup and Toothless find themselves in a new battle against a mysterious Dragon Rider, Drago. He wants to start a war using the dragons to rule the world. The two, along with their friends, must stand up and fight against Drago together if they want to change the future for both humans and dragons. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Train To Busan
programme.desc: (Film - Horror)

programme.title: The Croods
programme.desc: Grug and his family embark on a journey to search for a new place to live after their cave is destroyed. A young boy helps them trek through unknown places to find new shelter. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Boss Baby
programme.desc: Seven-year-old Tim is envious of his baby brother. But his animosity towards him doesn't last long when he learns that this baby, who calls himself The Boss, can talk and behave like an adult and is on a mission to stop Puppy Co from replacing the love for babies with puppies. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Boyka: Undisputed IV
programme.desc: After he accidentally kills his opponent, underground fighter Yuri Boyka questions everything he stands for and tries to win the freedom of the dead man's wife through a series of fights. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Avengers: Endgame
programme.desc: The actions of Thanos leave the universe in ruins with exactly half of all life disintegrated. The Avengers, however, refuse to give up and assemble again to try and bring back all the people that were lost, ready to do whatever it takes to undo the chaos caused by the Mad Titan. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Baby's Day Out
programme.desc: Director Patrick Read Johnson's adventurous family comedy 'Baby's Day Out' narrates the story of three wannabe kidnappers, Eddie (Joe Mantegna), Norby (Joe Pantoliano) and Veeko (Brian Haley) disguise themselves as photographers, enter a huge mansion and make away with Baby Bink (Adam and Jacob Worton), millionaires Bennington (Matthew Glave) and Laraine (Lara Flynn Boyle) Cotwell's son. But Baby Bink turns out to be more than a hand full for the crooks. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Pirates Of The Caribbean: Salazar's Revenge
programme.desc: (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
programme.desc: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl, nominated for several prestigious awards, follows Captain Jack Sparrow (Johnny Depp) and blacksmith Will Turner (Orlando Bloom) in the 17th century in the Caribbean Sea as they endeavour to liberate the abducted Elizabeth Swann (Keira Knightley) from the menacing and supernaturally cursed pirate crew of the Black Pearl who, due to a set of reasons, become undead skeletons at night. Will has personal reasons for assisting Jack in his mission to rescue Elizabeth, the daughter of Port Royal's Governor. The two launch a massive struggle to undo the curse. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Reign Of Fire
programme.desc: In the year 2020, the world has been ravaged by the dragons that were accidentally awakened from their slumber by humans. Now it is up to Quinn Abercromby (Christian Bale) and Denton Van Zan (Matthew McConaughey) to save mankind from annihilation. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide To The Galaxy
programme.desc: Arthur Dent has just lost his perfect woman to another and as if that wasn't enough, his friend, who actually turns out to be an alien, informs him about Earth's impending doom. Soon, Arthur is whisked away from Earth seconds before it is exploded to make way for a new hyperspace motorway. Plus, there are other woes such as being wanted by the police, Earth II, an insane electronic encyclopaedia, the absences of tea and so on and so forth. But, Arthur's day is not entirely lost because he now stands a chance to win back his lady love while being on the greatest adventure off Earth. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Undisputed III: Redemption
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Upgrade
programme.desc: After he is paralysed and his wife is killed in a brutal attack, Grey Trace, a technophobe, is approached by Eron, a billionaire, to implant an AI chip in his body to help him become mobile. This artificial intelligence called STEM bestows Grey with heightened senses and abilities and leads him to avenge the death of his wife. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Finding Dory
programme.desc: In the spinoff of 2003 animated adventure movie, 'Finding Nemo', Dory, the forgetful tang fish, remembers her parents in a flashback. She ventures out on a journey to the Jewel of Morro Bay along with Merlin and Nemo. They encounter numerous struggles on the way until a childhood memory guides Dory home. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Maleficent
programme.desc: Maleficent is a kind-hearted fairy, who wants peace to prevail in the kingdom. She is deceived by the love of her life, Stefan, who wants to be the king. In a turn of events, he cuts her wings and is crowned the king. A scorned Maleficent is hell-bent on attaining justice in her own ways. When she realises that Stefan is blessed with a daughter, Aurora, she places a curse on her. She reveals that on her sixteenth birthday, she will prick her finger on the spindle of a spinning wheel, which will cause her to fall into a deathlike sleep. Later, Maleficent realises that Aurora is the only one who can help restore peace in the kingdom and to her too. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Starship Troopers
programme.desc: After successfully completing graduation, Johnny Rico joins a military group and begins his training. Soon, he finds himself battling gigantic alien bug-like creatures who are on a mission to destroy Earth. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Chinese Zodiac
programme.desc: With the twelve ancient animal signs in the Chinese Zodiac stolen, Asian Hawk, a mercenary, sets out to retrieve them. He is accompanied by a Chinese student and a Parisian lady in his mission. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: Set in an alternate universe where both dinosaurs and humans exist, this animated adventure follows the unlikely friendship between Arlo, an Apatosaurus, and a feral caveboy. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Jungle Book
programme.desc: Mowgli, a boy raised by wolves, is forced to go to the human village by his friend Bagheera and the animal clan when a man-eating tiger vows to kill him. Along the way, he meets a lazy bear, Baloo, a vicious snake, Kaa, and a smooth-talking ape, King Louie. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Iron Man 2
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader
programme.desc: Lucy, Edmund and Eustace are stranded in Cambridge. They return to Narnia where they meet Prince Caspian. He explains to them that in the while that they were away, the face of Narnia has changed. Together, they realise that their homeland is under threat from green mist. They set out to find Lord Telmar, a close confidante of Caspian's father, in order to restore peace. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Mulan
programme.desc: Popular stars Ming-Na, Eddie Murphy, Miguel Ferrer and BD Wong lend their voices to recount a unique Chinese tale of a girl who takes an untrodden path of masquerading as a man just to save her land from the evil invaders. On gauging that her ailing father is in no position to defend his territory, 'Mulan' decides to take his place and lead her army to victory, but an unexpected company awaits her. (Film - Animation)

programme.desc: Chandan, an architect, travels to Prague for a project and falls in love with a local woman named Elena. At the same time, he struggles to deal with his past and overcome his growing insecurities. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: Do Knot Disturb
programme.desc: Raj is a rich businessman and is married to Kiran. However, Kiran suspects Raj of having an affair with a model, Dolly. She hires a detective to keep an eye on Raj and update her about Raj's whereabouts. Raj, in turn, hires a waiter and asks him to pretend to be Dolly's boyfriend. Dolly is also being stalked by a jealous lover. Raj's efforts to camouflage his affair with the model go in vain. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Avengers: Age Of Ultron
programme.desc: The second instalment of the 'Avengers' franchise brings the superheroes back together and this time, the stakes are higher than ever. With a view to stop the world from fighting anymore, Tony Stark enlists Bruce Banner's help to create an artificial intelligence called Ultron. But Tony's habit of playing God will end up costing the world as Ultron's personality takes charge of a robot's body, manufacturing several more like himself to declare war on the human race. Iron Man, Hulk, Captain America, Thor, Hawkeye and Black Widow are joined by a trusted few as they take on this very dangerous villain. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Turbo
programme.desc: A garden snail named Theo dreams of winning the Indy 500 race. But his obsession with speed makes him an outcast in the slow-paced snail community. Later, an accident fuses Theo's DNA with nitrous oxide, gifting him incredible speed and accuracy. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: An immensely powerful ancient mutant rises again and wishes to cleanse humankind in order to create a new world order. He recruits some powerful mutants, making them believe that mutants are superior to humans and it is their right to rule. To counter him, Raven tries to pull Charles out of his depressed state and lead a team of X-Men. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Aladdin
programme.desc: Aladdin, a kind-hearted street urchin, falls in love at the first sight of Princess Jasmine, the princess of Agrabah. When he stumbles upon a magic lamp, Aladdin uses the powers of the magical Genie to make himself a wealthy prince so that he can marry the princess. On the other hand, danger is lurking around Agrabah in the form of an evil sorcerer, Jafar. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: The Monkey King 2
programme.desc: (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
programme.desc: Gary 'Eggsy' Unwin, an unrefined but promising street kid, gets recruited and trained as an agent for a secret spy organisation. He goes through the organisation's gruelling training programme while a global threat emerges from an eccentric genius. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Starship Troopers
programme.desc: After successfully completing graduation, Johnny Rico joins a military group and begins his training. Soon, he finds himself battling gigantic alien bug-like creatures who are on a mission to destroy Earth. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Kingsman: The Golden Circle
programme.desc: The headquarters of the Kingsman organisation is destroyed by Poppy Adams, a psychotic leader of the world's largest drug cartel, the Golden Circle. Although Eggsy and Merlin survive the attack, they need help to go against the resourceful drug cartel and contact their allies in the United States. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Downhill
programme.desc: Billie and Pete, a married couple, take a family skiing vacation to Austria. However, after having a near-death experience, they are forced to confront their relationship and feelings for each other. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: The Rock
programme.desc: Sean Connery and Nicolas Cage star in this film that centres on an influential man who leads an army of military men to attack the city of San Francisco, only to be faced by a chemical weapon expert and an ex-con who join forces to stop the destruction. (Film - Action)

programme.title: G-Force
programme.desc: This action adventure movie is directed by Hoyt Yeatman and Hoyt Yeatman IV. The tale of four hamsters on a dangerous mission, led by a brown hamster, Darwin voiced by Sam Rockwell. His team members include Mooch, Juarez and Speckles, all of whom bring a little bit of madness to the mission. The prolific Nicholas Cage lends his voice to play Speckles, while comedians Tracy Morgan and Dee Bradley Baker voice Juarez and Mooch respectively. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Toy Story 2
programme.desc: When Woody is toy-napped by a greedy toy collector and is nowhere to be found, Buzz and his friends set out to rescue him. But Woody too is tempted by the idea of becoming immortal in a museum. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Chinese Zodiac
programme.desc: With the twelve ancient animal signs in the Chinese Zodiac stolen, Asian Hawk, a mercenary, sets out to retrieve them. He is accompanied by a Chinese student and a Parisian lady in his mission. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Sorcerer's Apprentice
programme.desc: An average-looking Dave (Jay Baruchel) is recruited as an apprentice by master sorcerer Balthazar Blake (Nicholas Cage). Together, they must save Manhattan from Blake's arch-nemesis Maxim Horvath. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Game Plan
programme.desc: (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Dragonball: Evolution
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Pearl Harbor
programme.desc: Childhood friends Rafe and Danny become army pilots and meet Evelyn, a navy nurse. However, the three of them later find themselves in the middle of the attack on Pearl Harbour during World War II. (Film - War)

programme.title: Alice In Wonderland
programme.desc: Based on the classic novel, this film follows 19-year-old Alice, who discovers a magical world strikingly similar to the nightmares she had as a child. As she meets and befriends one bizarre character after the other, she realises that it is her destiny to end the tyranny of the evil Red Queen by defeating the Jabberwocky. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Tim Burton's The Nightmare Before Christmas
programme.desc: Jack Skellington, a being from Halloween Town, finds Christmas Town and is instantly enchanted. The situation becomes riveting when his obsession with Christmas leads him to abduct Santa Claus. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Pirates Of The Caribbean: On Stranger Tides
programme.desc: Johnny Depp reprises his iconic role as the constantly flinching, smirking and cunning pirate, Captain Jack Sparrow, in the fourth installation of the Pirates of the Caribbean series, which is directed by Rob Marshall. Jack and Captain Barbossa set out on a journey to find the legendary fountain of youth. But he must face the fearsome pirate Blackbeard and his enigmatic daughter Angelica, who are also in search of the fountain. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Life Of Pi
programme.desc: Celebrated director Ang Lee conjures spectacular images out of Yann Martel's bestseller of the same name and presents this story of endurance and self-discovery in which Pi (Suraj Sharma), a young man, finds himself between a rock and a hard place when he survives a disastrous shipwreck, only to discover that his life boat has another passenger, a ferocious Bengal tiger called Richard Parker. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Monsters University
programme.desc: Mike and Sulley, two monsters, join the Monsters University in order to graduate as the scariest monsters on the planet. While Mike is serious about his ambitions, his peer Sulley whiles away most of his time. A special programme Roar Omega Roar becomes the perfect opportunity for them to showcase their skills. But when they play mischief with Dean Abigail Hardscrabble, she forbids them from participation. Mike decides that he will participate in the Scare Games challenge and takes a vow to leave school in case he loses. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Cars 2

programme.title: 101 Dalmatians

But the proud dogs puppies are kidnapped by Anitas boss Cruella De Vil (Glenn Close), who is stealing young Dalmatians to make the fur coat she has set her heart on. Enlisting the help of the other animals, Pongo and Perdita set out to find and rescue the pups from their fearsome captors. (Film - Family)

programme.title: Pirates Of The Caribbean: At World's End

programme.title: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom

She enlists the help of Owen Grady, a velociraptor trainer. But the duo soon discovers that the dinosaurs may be in a bigger peril than they anticipated. (Film - Adventure)

In the midst of this, Harry must also deal with his daughter's lover, who is a part of the mission. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: Keeping with his famous trend of aestheticizing violence, Quentin Tarantino brings a war film starring Brad Pitt, Christoph Waltz and Melanie Laurent. Set in the backdrop of World War II, 'Inglourious Basterds' traverses the scheming and plotting of two groups that aim to assassinate prominent Nazi political leaders. But a single night changes the fate of everyone involved when the two groups cross each other's paths. (Film - War)

programme.title: Incredibles 2

(Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: When he is falsely framed in a CIA operation, Jason Bourne is forced to return to his old ways as an assassin, in order to figure out why they are still after him. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Universal Soldier
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
programme.desc: The film, which is a directorial debut of Joe Johnston, tells the story of an absent-minded inventor who leaves his latest creation, an electromagnetic shrinking machine, unattended in his attic. The machine shrinks his and his neighbour's kids to 1/4-th of an inch, when they accidentally trigger it. When the newly tiny youngsters are tossed out with the trash, they must survive the long journey across the lawn. (Film - Family)

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Legendary assassin Jason Bourne uncovers mysteries of his past, which puts him in the cross-hairs of a superkiller. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Maze Runner
programme.desc: Thomas loses his memory and finds himself trapped in a massive maze called the Glade. He and his friends try to escape from the maze and eventually learn that they are subjects of an experiment. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Chronicles of Riddick
programme.desc: Following the events that took place in the previous instalment of the series, the infamous antihero, Riddick (Vin Diesel), holes up for five years dodging bounty hunters, which eventually leads him to planet Helion Prime. Soon after, the planet gets captured by an army as the Necromongers, led by Lord Marshal (Colm Feore), who are set to exterminate humanity. When Aereon (Judi Dench), leader of Helion's Elemental race, beseeches Riddick for help, he discovers the warrior within him. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Toy Story 3
programme.desc: Director Lee Unkrich's long time association with Pixar comes handy as he directs the Academy-award winning third instalment in the 3D computer animated comedy trilogy 'Toy Story'. With an ensemble cast consisting of actors like Tom Hanks and Tim Allen rendering their celebrated voiceovers, this visually appetising and emotionally enchanting animation takes viewers in the mysterious world of anthropomorphic toys Woody, Buzz and the gang, who find themselves in the company of untamed, uncivilised tots. Woody and Buzz must plan their great escape with the help of their newly found friends. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Radha Krishn
programme.desc: Radha gets happy after Krishna sends her a fruit basket and gulps down hot milk which results in painful blisters. Later, Rukmini informs Krishna about it and he transfers Radha's pain to himself. (TV Show - Mythology)

programme.title: Radha Krishn
programme.desc: As Radha recovers from the painful blisters, Krishna heals too. Rukmini witnesses this and confronts Radha, who tries to explain 'sakhi prem' to Rukmini but the latter is not convinced. (TV Show - Mythology)

programme.title: Radha Krishn

programme.title: Radha Krishn

programme.desc: Radha eats a few bites of the rice brought by Sudama and feels satiated. Later, Krishna feeds Rukmini, explaining that she should not feel bad as one day the realisation will dawn upon her. (TV Show - Mythology)

programme.title: Radha Krishn

programme.desc: Vin Diesel dons the role of an FBI agent who is allotted the most bizarre assignment of his life in this rib-tickling and enthralling film. Unable to save a brilliant scientist from enemy forces, Vin is tasked with protecting his family, which includes his wife, four children, an infant and a pet duck. Armed with sippers, baby carriers and his guns he must make sure he can don the role of 'The Pacifier' in the tumultuous course of events. (Film - Family)

He then declares himself king and tries to kill Simba. However, Simba escapes and grows up in the company of outcasts Timon and Pumbaa, a meerkat and warthog. Years later, Simba has a chance encounter with Nala the lioness who urges him to return to the pride and take his rightful place as the king. (Film - Animation)

(Film - Animation)

programme.title: Percy Jackson: Sea Of Monsters
programme.desc: Percy Jackson, the son of Posedion, decides to uphold Thalia's sacrifice. Thalia had sacrificed herself to get the others into her camp and her father Zeus found another way for her to live by transforming her into a pine tree, creating a magical border around the camp so that no other half-blood would suffer from a fate as she did. For this, he embarks on a journey, with his friends Annabeth, Clarisse and half-brother, Tyson, to the Sea of Monsters to find the Golden Fleece which has the power to save their home and training ground, Camp Half-Blood. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Dracula Untold
programme.desc: Vlad the Impaler, a Transylvanian prince, is raised by the Turkish Empire to be an elite Janissary in the Sultan's special force. Having massacred thousands, Vlad's guilty conscience forces him to return to his kingdom. During one of his trips in the forest, Vlad and his soldiers enter an abandoned cave where they are attacked by a monster. Vlad escapes from the cave, into the sunlight, and the creature doesn't follow. On his return to the kingdom he is visited by Turkish emissaries who demand a tribute of 1000 boys who would be trained to become Janissaries like Vlad. Unwilling to fulfil the demand, Vlad meets the Turkish Sultan and offers himself against the boys but is rejected. With no other option left, Vlad turns to the devilish creature he had met before in the forest for help. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Wonder Years
programme.desc: With a dry sense of humour and the insight one gains with maturity, a grown-up Kevin provides funny commentary on himself as a young boy trying to cope with the bizarre world of a teenager. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: In the wake of a zombie apocalypse, various survivors struggle to stay alive. As they search for safety and evade the undead, they are forced to grapple with rival groups and difficult choices. (TV Show - Horror)

programme.title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
programme.desc: As Steve Rogers battles to accept his role in the modern globe, he joins forces with another super soldier, the Black Widow, to fight against a fresh peril, a killer known as the Winter Soldier. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A compilation of snippets of movies and behind-the-scene moments of films where the cast and crew share their on-set experiences. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Chinese Zodiac
programme.desc: With the twelve ancient animal signs in the Chinese Zodiac stolen, Asian Hawk, a mercenary, sets out to retrieve them. He is accompanied by a Chinese student and a Parisian lady in his mission. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Underwater
programme.desc: Norah and her team find themselves in a dangerous situation as they work at the bottom of the Mariana Trench and clash against an unidentified species. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: In a faraway swamp, in solitude, lives the green ogre 'Shrek', brought to life by the iconic Mike Myers. His lonely existence is infested with fairytale characters, sent there by the evil Lord Farquaad, who wants him to rescue his beautiful bride-to-be, Princess Fiona (Cameron Diaz) and thus, he sets out with Donkey, voiced by the unmatchable Eddie Murphy, to wage a war against a fire-breathing dragon and rescue the princess. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: Set in an alternate universe where both dinosaurs and humans exist, this animated adventure follows the unlikely friendship between Arlo, an Apatosaurus, and a feral caveboy. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Home Alone 3
programme.desc: Eight-year-old Alex fends off thieves who are trying to acquire a top-secret computer chip that they have hidden in his toy car, with which they intend to help a terrorist group. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: War For The Planet Of The Apes
programme.desc: The Alpha Omega, a paramilitary faction, attacks Caesar's clan, killing his wife and the oldest son. Angered, Caeser rallies his army to take revenge from Colonel, the man behind the faction. Battling his own dark instincts, he decides to lead a final confrontation that will determine the future of the planet. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Baby's Day Out
programme.desc: Director Patrick Read Johnson's adventurous family comedy 'Baby's Day Out' narrates the story of three wannabe kidnappers, Eddie (Joe Mantegna), Norby (Joe Pantoliano) and Veeko (Brian Haley) disguise themselves as photographers, enter a huge mansion and make away with Baby Bink (Adam and Jacob Worton), millionaires Bennington (Matthew Glave) and Laraine (Lara Flynn Boyle) Cotwell's son. But Baby Bink turns out to be more than a hand full for the crooks. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Ratatouille
programme.desc: Remy, a rat, aspires to become a renowned French chef. However, he fails to realise that people despise rodents and will never enjoy a meal cooked by him. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Pacific Rim: Uprising
programme.desc: Jake Pentecost, who had left his Jaeger training midway, gets a chance to live up to his father's legacy as he teams up with his estranged sister and former co-pilot to stop a new Kaiju threat. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Predator
programme.desc: Dutch and his team are out on a mission to rescue a group of hostages in Central America. There, they discover that they are being targeted by an extraterrestrial warrior. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Tomorrowland
programme.desc: Starring Academy Award winner George Clooney, this sci-fi adventure follows the exploits of Casey, a curious teenager, and Frank, a disengaged former inventor, who embark on a dangerous mission to unravel the secrets of Tomorrowland, an unexplored dimension in time and space. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers stand on opposite sides when world leaders try to interfere with their activities. With the two superhero factions--led by Captain America and Iron Man--pit against each other, are the Avengers doomed. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Guardians Of The Galaxy
programme.desc: Peter Quill, kidnapped from the earth by space pirates while he was still a child, escapes from the planet Morag, carrying with him a mysterious yet valuable orb and, as a result, is followed closely by the assassin of Ronan the Accuser who wants it for himself. Quill knows that he cannot take on Ronan alone in a battle in space, so he decides to put together a team of brave and heroic individuals with superpowers, calling them the Guardians of the Galaxy. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: No Good Deed
programme.desc: (Film - Tele Film)

programme.title: Shanghai Knights
programme.desc: Jackie Chan and Owen Wilson reprise their roles as Chon and Roy and head to London to take revenge on the Chinese rebel who killed Chon's father. But during their pursuit, they stumble upon a dangerous conspiracy. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Flubber
programme.desc: Robin Williams plays the absent-minded Professor Phillip Brainard in this fun-filled film that looks at the adventures that follow after he creates a rubber-like bouncy substance, Flubber, which helps object fly. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Aladdin
programme.desc: Aladdin, a kind-hearted street urchin, falls in love at the first sight of Princess Jasmine, the princess of Agrabah. When he stumbles upon a magic lamp, Aladdin uses the powers of the magical Genie to make himself a wealthy prince so that he can marry the princess. On the other hand, danger is lurking around Agrabah in the form of an evil sorcerer, Jafar. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Bad Company
programme.desc: Anthony Hopkins dons the role of a sophisticated CIA agent who tries to transform a street punk (Chris Rock) into a savvy spy after the death of his twin brother. They must together save their city from terrorists. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: The Incredibles
programme.desc: Winning the 77th Academy award for the Best Animated feature, the film directed by Brad Bird, revolves around a family of superheroes who are forced to hide their superpowers and lead mundane lives due to several lawsuits filed against them. Although, Mr. Incredible's desire to help people drags the whole family into a battle with the evil Syndrome who has been responsible for murdering countless retired superheroes. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Lucy in the Sky
programme.desc: Lucy Cola, an astronaut, returns to Earth from her first space mission and begins to feel disconnected from normal life. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Upgrade
programme.desc: After he is paralysed and his wife is killed in a brutal attack, Grey Trace, a technophobe, is approached by Eron, a billionaire, to implant an AI chip in his body to help him become mobile. This artificial intelligence called STEM bestows Grey with heightened senses and abilities and leads him to avenge the death of his wife. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: TRON: Legacy
programme.desc: Based on a story written by Hollywood's renowned Adam Horowitz, Walt Disney Pictures releases 'Tron: Legacy', a sequel to the 1982 cult film 'Tron', which created a buzz among video game geeks as well as movie buffs, that depicts the adventurous journey of Sam, son of a video game developer who mysteriously disappeared 20 years ago, as he is sucked into a virtual reality called the Grid, created by his father, with a mission to stop a corrupted programme from invading the human world. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Air Force One
programme.desc: The legendary Harrison Ford dons the role of the president of the United States of America, who journeys to Russia and speaks out against terrorism, in this action-packed film directed by the talented Wolfgang Petersen. Trepidation sets in when his family and he are taken as hostages while aboard the 'Air Force One' by those who are out to incite global terror forcing the President to rise to the occasion and combat the crisis at hand. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
programme.desc: As Steve Rogers battles to accept his role in the modern globe, he joins forces with another super soldier, the Black Widow, to fight against a fresh peril, a killer known as the Winter Soldier. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Starship Troopers
programme.desc: After successfully completing graduation, Johnny Rico joins a military group and begins his training. Soon, he finds himself battling gigantic alien bug-like creatures who are on a mission to destroy Earth. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: When he is falsely framed in a CIA operation, Jason Bourne is forced to return to his old ways as an assassin, in order to figure out why they are still after him. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Wreck-It Ralph
programme.desc: Ralph is tired of playing the role of a bad guy and embarks on a journey to become a video game hero. But Ralph accidentally lets loose a deadly enemy that threatens the entire arcade. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Thing About Harry
programme.desc: Sam, a young gay man, is forced to share a ride with his high school enemy, Harry. However, things soon change between them when Sam learns that Harry is pansexual. (Film - Tele Film)

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: When NASA learns that an enormous asteroid is all set to destroy Earth, it recruits Harry, a deep sea oil driller, and his crew, in order to drill a hole in the asteroid and plant a nuclear bomb in it. In the midst of this, Harry must also deal with his daughter's lover, who is a part of the mission. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: The Jungle Book
programme.desc: Mowgli, a boy raised by wolves, is forced to go to the human village by his friend Bagheera and the animal clan when a man-eating tiger vows to kill him. Along the way, he meets a lazy bear, Baloo, a vicious snake, Kaa, and a smooth-talking ape, King Louie. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Jason Bourne's location is revealed to the FBI when he decrypts their files to know more about his past and his father. CIA director Robert Dewey unwillingly authorises Heather Lee, head of the Cyber Ops division, to contact Bourne and bring him back. However, he also secretly sends an assassin in order to execute Bourne. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Lucy in the Sky
programme.desc: Lucy Cola, an astronaut, returns to Earth from her first space mission and begins to feel disconnected from normal life. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: The Bourne Legacy
programme.desc: The US Department of Defense, which runs covert operations, offers stimulants to its field operatives for better results. When discovered, an English reporter plans to expose these secret activities. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Lion King
programme.desc: Directed by Roger Allers and Rob Minkoff, 'The Lion King' follows the life of the endearing young lion Simba who is the heir to the throne of his father Mufasa who rules the animal kingdom. But Simba's evil uncle Scar plots to kill him and his father to occupy the throne. The plan succeeds partially with Mufasa being bumped off by Scar. Simba manages to escape and returns to his birthplace on becoming an adult only to see Scar as the ruler. He immediately plots to take over the kingdom with his pals. But wily Scar is no minnow. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Pacifier
programme.desc: Vin Diesel dons the role of an FBI agent who is allotted the most bizarre assignment of his life in this rib-tickling and enthralling film. Unable to save a brilliant scientist from enemy forces, Vin is tasked with protecting his family, which includes his wife, four children, an infant and a pet duck. Armed with sippers, baby carriers and his guns he must make sure he can don the role of 'The Pacifier' in the tumultuous course of events. (Film - Family)

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers stand on opposite sides when world leaders try to interfere with their activities. With the two superhero factions--led by Captain America and Iron Man--pit against each other, are the Avengers doomed. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: Set in an alternate universe where both dinosaurs and humans exist, this animated adventure follows the unlikely friendship between Arlo, an Apatosaurus, and a feral caveboy. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Within These Walls
programme.desc: A single mother breaks up with her boyfriend and asks him to move out of their house when things do not work for her. However, she soon starts experiencing strange happenings in the house. (Film - Tele Film)

programme.title: The Call of the Wild
programme.desc: Buck, a giant yet generous dog, feels helpless when he is abducted from his home and transported to the remote Yukon, where Perrault decides to use him for his dog sled mail operations. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Despicable Me 3
programme.desc: Gru meets his long-lost twin brother Dru, after getting fired from the Anti-Villain League. However, the siblings find themselves at loggerheads with a child actor-turned-villain. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Chinese Zodiac
programme.desc: With the twelve ancient animal signs in the Chinese Zodiac stolen, Asian Hawk, a mercenary, sets out to retrieve them. He is accompanied by a Chinese student and a Parisian lady in his mission. (Film - Action)

programme.desc: Based on the classic novel, this film follows 19-year-old Alice, who discovers a magical world strikingly similar to the nightmares she had as a child. programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II

programme.title: Starship Troopers
programme.desc: After successfully completing graduation, Johnny Rico joins a military group and begins his training. Soon, he finds himself battling gigantic alien bug-like creatures who are on a mission to destroy Earth. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Jeena Marna Tere Sang
programme.desc: Amar is the son of a millionaire. He decides to avenge on Asha for slapping him in public, but later falls for her. He also discovers the truth about his father. (Romance,Drama,Family)

programme.title: Taqdeer Ka Tamasha
programme.desc: A single mother, Geeta, must deal with her two sons, the elder a Police Inspector Suryapratap; while the younger, Satya, a hoodlum, when both get into conflicts. Things only get worse after Satya gets arrested, arguments ensue and he leaves. He gets hired by Sheshnaag for the sole purpose of exacting vengeance against his rival, Deva. Both brothers are fated to meet again when Suryapratap decides to accumulate evidence to arrest Deva. Neither of the brothers know that Deva has an alias, and is determined to thwart any attempt for revenge nor face any charges under the Indian Penal Code. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Tadipaar
programme.desc: Shankar (Mithun Chakraborty) is sentenced to live outside the limits of the city due to a Police case. One day he happens to rescue a woman in distress from some hoodlums and finds out that her name is Namkeen, who resembles a missing multi-millionaire Mohinidevi (Pooja Bhatt). Shankar asks Namkeen to impersonate Mohinidevi to embezzle her wealth. Namkeen agrees to do so, but the question remains: where is Mohinidevi, and what will happen to Namkeen when she is found? (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Sikka
programme.desc: Two close and very wealthy friends, Vijay and Pranlal, decide to cement their friendship to a relationship when Vijay proposes marriage on behalf of his sister, Shobha, with Pranlal's son, Amar. Pranlal agrees, and preparations are on for the marriage to take place. Vijay finds out that Pranlal and his men are using their business as a front for drugs and smuggling, and he decides to cancel the wedding. Pranlal is angry with Vijay, but refuses to give up his criminal career. When Amar finds out about his dad's spurious activities, he kills himself. Pranlal, humiliated and angered, vows to avenge Amar's death, and wants Shobha to be Amar's widow for the rest of her life, which is not acceptable to Vijay. Then Shobha meets with a handsome stranger named Jackie, who rescues her. She offers him employment with her brother's firm, and they fall in love with each other. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Bhishma
programme.desc: Paro, her mother, and her brother, Natwar, find an unconscious man near their town. They bring him over to their house, nurse and nurture him back to good health, only to find out that he has the mind of a 12 year of old child, and name him Bhola. Years pass by, Paro has fallen in love with Bhola, for he rescued her from a molester, and both would like to get married. Before that could happen, Bhola is viciously attacked and left for dead by Paro's molester, and is hospitalized. While in hospital, Police Sub-Inspector Abhimanyu Verma finds out that Bhola is not who he claims to be but a homicidal maniac, wanted for killing three policemen - named Bhisma - and is possibly masquerading as a 12 year old child to hide from the police.

programme.title: Betaabi
programme.desc: Film about arranged marriage in India

programme.title: Loha
programme.desc: Honest and diligent Police Inspector Amar lives a middle-classed lifestyle in Bombay. In his attempt to arrest bandit Sher Singh, he and Inspector Dayal are attacked, Amar survives, but Dayal gets his legs crushed under a truck and becomes wheelchair-bound. Subsequently, Amar arrests local politician, Jagannath Prasad, who not only gets released without getting charged but Amar gets reprimanded, and decides to resign. Shortly thereafter, Sher Singh hijacks a bus and holds the passengers in exchange for 25 of his jailed associates. Dayal's granddaughter, Seema, is amongst them, and Dayal asks Amar for assistance. Amar, along with ex-convict, Qasim Ali, and Karan, a drug-dealer, does manage to rescue them but differences crop up between the trio and they part ways. Then Amar finds out that Qasim and Karan have masterminded a plan to facilitate the escape of the 25 convicts, and decides to confront them. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Gunaah
programme.desc: Tough cop Prabha (Bipasha Basu) is haunted by the demons of her past. Being an illegitimate daughter of a prostitute, she has had a very bad childhood and there once occurred an incident in her life when she was driven to the point of committing a murder. But today, now that she is a cop, she believes that she can clear her conscience by reforming a criminal. Prabha's life is turned topsy-turvy with the entry of Aditya (Dino Morea), who is a good person at heart but was forced to take the path of crime due to the wrong doing of the system. Prabha goes to Aditya's house to nab him, but gets carried away when she sees him bathing. Aditya slips from under her vigilant eyes and a hasty chase follows. Prabha stays close on the heels of fleeing Aditya. At one point when she is about to fall off the rooftop Aditya stops running and extends his hand to save her. This act makes a great impact on Prabha. Prabha decides to know Aditya's past and find out what prompted him to commit crime in the first place. She decides to reform him but herself gets 'reformed' into loving him in the process. (Drama)

programme.title: Mr. Natwarlal
programme.desc: Mr. Natwarlal is a 1979 Hindi Action comedy movie. Produced by Tony Glaad it is directed by Rakesh Kumar. Natwar is just a young boy when his beloved older brother and caretaker, police officer Gridharilal (Ajit), is framed for bribery by sinister criminal mastermind Vikram (Amjad Khan). When he grows up, Natwar (Amitabh Bachchan) creates a secret identity for himself, posing as a powerful and mysterious underworld figure named Mr. Natwarlal, determined to slowly but surely exact vengeance on Vikram. - via Wikipedia ( http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mr._Natwarlal ) (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: 15th August
programme.desc: Nagpal kills Chaudhry and his son, Ram, a military officer. Chaudhry's second son, Vikram, vows to destroy Nagpal who is all set to become the Chief Minister on the upcoming Indian Independence Day.

programme.title: Hote Hote Pyar Ho Gaya
programme.desc: Pinky and Atul alias Bunty are in love with each other, and plan to marry. They, however, run into opposition with their respective families, as their life-partners have already been picked for them. Pinky's dad, a retired Colonel has picked Police Inspector Arjun to be Pinky's groom; while Ajit and Asha, Bunty's dad and mom, have picked Shobha to be Bunty's bride. Both Bunty and Pinky plan to go through with their respective marriages to the partners of their parents' choices, and then eventually divorce them, and then get married to each other. They give in to their parents' choices, and their parents are delighted and both the weddings take place with great pomp and ceremony. Pinky then starts picking fights with Arjun and his mom, and openly insults them; while Bunty also does the same with Shobha. Their plans seem to be going on track, until they come to know that Shobha and Arjun are meeting on the sly. What impact will this have on their plans and their marriage? (Action,Crime,Romance)

programme.title: Zakhmi Sipahi
programme.desc: Shakti is an honest police officer out to avenge the death of his father, Gautam Gorakhnath, and the trials and obstacles he faces while he goes through corruption, love, and usual Hindi film masala. (Action)

programme.title: Juaari
programme.desc: Vijay, a young man, resorts to gambling to free his lover, Shanti, whom Sanga holds captive, but he soon runs out of luck and gets arrested. (Family)

programme.title: Saaya
programme.desc: Tanya is a rich woman who is married to another rich man named Vinod. But their lives change by Vinod's death. Tanya than starts falling in love with a doctor named Akash. But Akash is in love with a woman named Maya and after some time gets married to her. But their marriage does not last long. Because, first Maya leaves him to travel to another part of India to help people who are sick; and then Akash receives news that she is dead. Tanya comes up to console Akash and hopes that he will now love, accept and marry her. But Akash does not do so, as he is still immersed in Maya's memories, and believes that Maya is still alive and calling out to him. Is Akash going out of his mind? (Horror,Mystery,Romance)

programme.title: Sultanat
programme.desc: After his wife dies in childbirth as the result of an unsuccessful coup attempt by the bandit Razoulli (Amrish Puri), Gen. Khalid (Dharmendra) vows to avenge her death in this Bollywood thriller. But as he prepares to carry out his plan against Razoulli's son (Sunny Deol) years later, little does Khalid know that the two are connected by a long-buried secret. Sridevi, Karan Kapoor and Juhi Chawla also star. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Aaj Ka Ravan
programme.desc: A series of unfortunate events plague journalist Shanti after a fellow journalist is shot to death on her doorstep

programme.title: Baadshah
programme.desc: K. Jhunjhunwala would like to locate his missing/runaway daughter, Seema Malhotra, so that he can get her married to Nitin Dharampal; Prominent businessman, Mahindra, would like to negotiate with his daughter, Sonu's kidnappers, and secure her release. And the Central Bureau of Investigation would like to protect the life of Chief Minister Gayetri Bachchan under the mission code-named "Maa", and the CBI Officer in Charge to be code-named "Baadshah". Now Baadshah happens to be a bumbling and out of work Private Investigator, who has agreed to assist Jhunjhunwala and Mahindra, and while doing so is mistaken for the CBI Agent, ends up working for the assassins, and must assassinate Gayetri or end up losing his team of four fellow-bumblers, and Mahindra's daughter. What results is hilarious chaos, with no one knowing what the other is doing, and each one being each other's suspect(s). To make matters worse Jhunjhunwala is not really Seema's dad, but someone else with an ulterior motive. (Action,Comedy)

programme.title: Mela
programme.desc: Roopa, a beautiful young village belle is much loved by the villagers of Chandanpur. Chandanpur celebrates a huge Mela every year and this year, they invite a Minister to inaugurate it. In an assassination attempt that follows, a massacre takes place. Chandanpur is devastated and Roopa's family gets wiped out. She vows revenge. Into her life enter two men, the gregarious Kishan and the volatile Shankar, causing much upheaval in their relationship. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Dilwale
programme.desc: The Police Commissioner, Advocate Sinha and Police Inspector Vikram Singh arrive at the Central Mental Hospital to speak with an inmate, Arun Saxena. They hope to get Vikram to befriend Arun so that they could unravel the mystery as to why Arun ended up romancing wealthy Sapna, then getting involved with Jyoti, and subsequently killing her. Arun is arrested, confesses to the the homicide and is sentenced to be hanged. This news unsettles Arun to such an extend that he becomes mentally unstable and is institutionalized. Vikram hopes to befriend Arun, get him cured and medically discharged, and ensure that he is hanged. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Inteha
programme.desc: Tina Saxena lives a wealthy life-style with her widowed businessman dad. One day, all of a sudden, she gets a nasty shock when her dad informs her that he had a mistress before he was married to her mother, and that this affair had resulted in the birth of a daughter, Nandini. Much to Tina's distaste, he invites Nandini to live with them, and asks her to look after Tina after he passes away, as he has been ill for quite sometime. Mr. Saxena does pass away, leaving a grieving Tina and Nandini, with Tina still having nothing to do with her step-sister. Then a dashing young man, Ranbir Oberoi, enters Tina's life and it is love at first sight for them. Nandini also approves of him, and it looks like Tina has given up on her dislike for Nandini. After a few days, and a purse-snatching incident, Nandini counsels Tina that she should consider breaking up with Ranbir. Aghast at this sudden volte face. (Drama,Thriller)

programme.title: Aakhri Ghulam
programme.desc: Young Bheema is told by his father, Dinu, that generations of their family have always been slaves to the wealthy Thakurs. When Bheema does not heed this, and not only befriends Sonam, Thakur Daulat Singh's daughter, but also has a physical altercation with Raja Bahadur, Thakur's son, he is publicly whipped. Shortly thereafter his dad passes away after being bitten by a snake. Daulat finds out that Sonam likes Bheema and has her moved to London, and ensures that she forgets him. Subsequently, on her return as an adult she returns home and is told that Bheema is serving 3 years in prison for killing a male named Shamsher Singh. Nevertheless, she renews her friendship with him but will soon find him on the run from the Police - this time for killing a union leader named Kumar. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Daraar
programme.desc: Raj Malhotra lives with his mother, and comes from a very wealthy family. He meets Priya Bhatia, who works with a real estate agency, and instantly falls in love with her. (Thriller,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Kaun Kare Kurbanie
programme.desc: After his transfer from Delhi, Inspector Arjun Singh lives in Bombay along with his wife, Anita, school-going son, Munna; and a younger collegian brother, Ajit. Arjun is disappointed with Ajit as he spends most of his time singing, dancing and flirting with girls. Then a series of sexual molestations and killings of attractive bikini-clad young women take place, and Arjun is assigned to this case. After a short period of time, his investigations lead him to a wealthy suspect, but when the suspect's daughter is molested and killed, his department gets evidence that may implicate another suspect - none other than Ajit. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Dhadkan
programme.desc: Dhadkan is about Anjali (Shilpa Shetty) who is a girl that hails from an extremely rich and influential family. Her father Mr. Chauhan (Kiran Kumar) is a renowned businessman and has many dreams for his daughter. But Anjali is in love with Dev (Sunil Shetty) who is very poor & often cannot even afford to clothe himself properly. Dev also loves Anjali, wants to marry her so has to meet her father. (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Juaari
programme.desc: Vijay, a young man, resorts to gambling to free his lover, Shanti, whom Sanga holds captive, but he soon runs out of luck and gets arrested. (Family)

programme.title: Zeher A Love Story
programme.desc: Siddharth, a police officer who is soon to be divorced, has an affair with Anna. However, when she is found dead, he realises he got more than he bargained for. (Thriller)

programme.title: Sultanat
programme.desc: After his wife dies in childbirth as the result of an unsuccessful coup attempt by the bandit Razoulli (Amrish Puri), Gen. Khalid (Dharmendra) vows to avenge her death in this Bollywood thriller. But as he prepares to carry out his plan against Razoulli's son (Sunny Deol) years later, little does Khalid know that the two are connected by a long-buried secret. Sridevi, Karan Kapoor and Juhi Chawla also star. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Kab? Kyoon? Aur Kahan?
programme.desc: Dharmendra plays a suave CID Officer who romances Babita on board a ship and slowly we get to the plot which involves Babita's dad who dies under mysterious circumstances leaving behind a huge " property" and an evil looking uncle Pran who is after it and her.. Nothing is as it seems as the sinister plot unfolds and our innocent heroine is under threat of losing her sanity and perhaps her life.. Unless of course the hero manages to unravel the plot and save them all..It involves the mystery of dead body in a coffin and things that go bump in the night. (Action,Mystery,Romance)

programme.title: Devta
programme.desc: Film starring Arun Bakshi, Mithun Chakraborty and Mushtaq Khan (Action)

programme.title: Krishna Arjun
programme.desc: Sharda Yadav is the widow of Ramnath, who was a freedom fighter. Now she lives a poor but very respectable lifestyle with her two sons, Krishna and Arjun, in a small rural town in India. Years pass by, Krishna and Arjun have both grown up. Krishna and his mom would like to send Arjun to Bombay to study and become a professional. Accordingly, Arjun travels to Bombay, where he resides in a hostel, meets a beautiful collegian named Punam, and both fall in love with each other. Then Arjun gets devastating news of the passing away of his mother. He travels home and finds that nothing is the same anymore, for Krishna has been arrested, found guilty of brutally raping and then killing a young school-teacher widow by the name of Meera, and unable to bear this shock of this disgrace, his mother has passed away. Arjun must now meet with Krishna and find out what had happened after he left town, and whether there is any truth to Krishna's crime.

programme.title: Juaari
programme.desc: Vijay, a young man, resorts to gambling to free his lover, Shanti, whom Sanga holds captive, but he soon runs out of luck and gets arrested. (Family)

programme.title: Agnivarsha
programme.desc: The film is Based on an incident from the Mahabharata and also made as a play on a Girish Karnad titled Fire in the Rain. The film features Amitabh Bachchan in a cameo appearance as Lord Indra. Jackie Shroff plays the main lead in the film as Puravasu the head priest, Raveena playing the role of his unfaithful wife in love with Yavakri. Nagarjuna played Yavakri the priest's jealous rival and Prabhudeva as a demon who kills Yavakri. While Milind Soman plays the younger brother of Jackie Shroff as Aravasu, the female lead opposite Milind is played by Sonali Kulkarni. (Drama,Fantasy)

programme.title: Hote Hote Pyar Ho Gaya
programme.desc: Pinky and Atul alias Bunty are in love with each other, and plan to marry. They, however, run into opposition with their respective families, as their life-partners have already been picked for them. Pinky's dad, a retired Colonel has picked Police Inspector Arjun to be Pinky's groom; while Ajit and Asha, Bunty's dad and mom, have picked Shobha to be Bunty's bride. Both Bunty and Pinky plan to go through with their respective marriages to the partners of their parents' choices, and then eventually divorce them, and then get married to each other. They give in to their parents' choices, and their parents are delighted and both the weddings take place with great pomp and ceremony. Pinky then starts picking fights with Arjun and his mom, and openly insults them; while Bunty also does the same with Shobha. Their plans seem to be going on track, until they come to know that Shobha and Arjun are meeting on the sly. What impact will this have on their plans and their marriage? (Action,Crime,Romance)

programme.title: Sultanat
programme.desc: After his wife dies in childbirth as the result of an unsuccessful coup attempt by the bandit Razoulli (Amrish Puri), Gen. Khalid (Dharmendra) vows to avenge her death in this Bollywood thriller. But as he prepares to carry out his plan against Razoulli's son (Sunny Deol) years later, little does Khalid know that the two are connected by a long-buried secret. Sridevi, Karan Kapoor and Juhi Chawla also star. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Shaadi Karke Phas Gaya Yaar
programme.desc: Ayaan lives a very wealthy lifestyle with his married brother, Karan and his wife, Anju; a younger sister, Yamini, and brother, Rahul; his mom, and grandma; and runs a garage. One day he meets with beautiful model, Ahana, and falls head over heels in love with her. She forgets her personal diary at his garage, and through this Ayaan woos, wins her heart, and both get married. Ahana soon finds out that despite of Ayaan's wealth, his family is very conservative and tradition-bound. This causes some bitterness between the newly-weds, which gets worse when she becomes pregnant and wants to abort the child. While visiting her mom on their dog's birthday, Ahana has an accident which results in a miscarriage. Ayaan blames her for losing the child, but his mother convinces him and he apologizes. Few months later, Ahana becomes pregnant again, and that's when she finds out that Ayaan had pulled wool over her eyes through her personal diary... (Romance)

programme.title: China Gate
programme.desc: After witnessing the brutal slaying of her Forest Officer father, Sunder Rajan, at the hands of dreaded dacoit Jageera, Sandhya goes to Colonel Krishnakant Puri and asks for his assistance in bringing an end to Jageera's rule in the Devdurg region. Krishnakant agrees to assist her, and summons about a dozen of his fellow officers and subordinates to assist him. They all assemble at Devdurg with all the necessary ammunitions and arms to combat Jageera, not realizing that Jageera has influence over the local police detachment, who will prevent Puri and his men to possess any guns and weapons. This does not deter Puri and his men, and they continue to stay on in Devdurg and gain the confidence of the villagers. What the villagers do not know that Krishnakant and his men had all been dishonorably discharged from the army for cowardice and retreating when attacked by the enemy. Will Puri and his men abandon Devdurg and let history repeat itself? (Action,Adventure,Drama,Thriller,Western)

programme.title: Keemat
programme.desc: Ajay and Dev are two small-time crooks. One day they accidentally killed a man named Mohan Tripathi. With a good and pleasant mind they find out the address of the decreased and pays a visit to his village. Only to see the young man's family eagerly waiting for his return from abroad, seeing the family's plight they decides to lie about the young man and told the family that he is alive but was delayed because of some urgent work. Days and months passed and Mohan did not showed up towards his family and both young men continues to lie to them. The question remain what will be the outcome of Ajay and Dev when the family learns that there son is no longer alive and that both are his killers? (Action,Comedy,Drama)

programme.title: Kalyug
programme.desc: The husband of a woman who commits suicide after a run-in with the adult entertainment industry seeks revenge on those who drove her to her death. In doing so, he delves into the world of international human trafficking, eventually traveling across the world to seek out the ringleaders of this horrifying enterprise. (Thriller)

programme.title: Taqdeer Ka Tamasha
programme.desc: A single mother, Geeta, must deal with her two sons, the elder a Police Inspector Suryapratap; while the younger, Satya, a hoodlum, when both get into conflicts. Things only get worse after Satya gets arrested, arguments ensue and he leaves. He gets hired by Sheshnaag for the sole purpose of exacting vengeance against his rival, Deva. Both brothers are fated to meet again when Suryapratap decides to accumulate evidence to arrest Deva. Neither of the brothers know that Deva has an alias, and is determined to thwart any attempt for revenge nor face any charges under the Indian Penal Code. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: 15th August
programme.desc: Nagpal kills Chaudhry and his son, Ram, a military officer. Chaudhry's second son, Vikram, vows to destroy Nagpal who is all set to become the Chief Minister on the upcoming Indian Independence Day.

programme.title: Aaj Ka Ravan
programme.desc: A series of unfortunate events plague journalist Shanti after a fellow journalist is shot to death on her doorstep

programme.title: Diljale
programme.desc: Captain Ranvir is assigned the task of apprehending two terrorists named Shaka and Dara. Upon arrival in the region, he meets with and falls in love with Radhika, the daughter of Rajasaheb, who also is a Mantri. The latter approves of him, and arranges his wedding with his daughter. Before the engagement could take place, Ranvir finds out that he has a rival in Shaka, who was in love with Radhika before, and is all set to prevent this marriage at any and costs. Ranvir decides to postpone his wedding until such time he arrests Shaka and his associates - a decision that will not only pit him against well-armed terrorists, but also result in the abduction of a bus-load of Vaishnodevi devotees - which include Radhika and her Bua. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Consumer)

programme.title: Waqt Ki Awaz
programme.desc: Wealthy Lata I. Prasad refuses to obey her widower father's instructions to get married to equally wealthy Rajan, the second son of Sikanker Lal Thakkar, her dad's business partner. She runs away from home, and shortly thereafter her father locates her living with a truck-driver, Vishwa Pratap, and his pretty sister, Lakshmi. She refuses to return home, and insists on marrying Vishwa. She will soon regret her decision when she finds out that Vishwa has been arrested for killing a male named Billa, and may either spend his life behind bars or be hanged. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Consumer)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Consumer)

programme.title: Mohabbat Ki Arzoo
programme.desc: Orphaned Motor Mechanic Raja (Rishi Kapoor) likes to live it up on pay-day, which is the first of every month, and behaves like a very rich man, in a borrowed garage car. One such day he gives a lift to Poonam Singh (Zeba Bakhtiar) who is stranded on a wet rainy night. He introduces himself as a wealthy man, and she introduces herself as a poor school-teahcer, not knowing that both are deceiving each other. Both meet on several occasions, and fall in love. Raja tells her that he is a motor mechanic, and she tells him that she is the city's richest man's, Rai Bahadur Mahendra Pratap Singh's (Mukesh Khanna) daughter. Rai Bahadur is enraged at the very thought of his daughter marrying a motor mechanic, and decides to marry his daughter off to his friend, Dr. Anand's (Kader Khan) only son, Amar. The pleas of his daughter and Raja fall on deaf ears, and no one can stop Rai Bahadur from doing what he has always wanted to do - on his own terms. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Consumer)

programme.title: Diljale
programme.desc: Captain Ranvir is assigned the task of apprehending two terrorists named Shaka and Dara. Upon arrival in the region, he meets with and falls in love with Radhika, the daughter of Rajasaheb, who also is a Mantri. The latter approves of him, and arranges his wedding with his daughter. Before the engagement could take place, Ranvir finds out that he has a rival in Shaka, who was in love with Radhika before, and is all set to prevent this marriage at any and costs. Ranvir decides to postpone his wedding until such time he arrests Shaka and his associates - a decision that will not only pit him against well-armed terrorists, but also result in the abduction of a bus-load of Vaishnodevi devotees - which include Radhika and her Bua. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Consumer)

programme.title: Qayamat
programme.desc: CBI Officer Akram Sheikh (Sunil Shetty) is on the verge of nabbing three dreaded Pakistan-backed arms dealers , the brothers Ali (Arbaaz Khan) and Abbas (Sanjay Kapoor) and their common moll Laila (Isha Koppikar) . When Sheikh busts an important arms deal conducted by his three targets , Ali-Abbas join forces with Gopal (Chunky Pandey) , a corrupt scientist to get hold of a deadly virus and take the tourists at the Elphinstone Jail resort as hostage . Akram Sheikh is now compelled to get help from Rachit (Ajay Devgan) , a criminal serving jail time who was a former associate of Ali-Abbas and the only person in history to have successfully escaped the Elphinstone jail . Along with a commando team , they try to pull off a rescue attempt by breaking in the jail and rescuing the hostages . (Action,Romance,Thriller)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Consumer)

programme.title: Ansh
programme.desc: This story is about Deputy Superintendent of Police Bhagat Pandey (Om Puri), who is thorough, honest, and has an excellent track record of apprehending criminals. This background creates problems for him with other criminals who are closely connected to powerful politicians. As a result he is transferred to Bombay (now know as Mumbai). He takes charge of his post, and transforms everything to a diligent and honest policing machine. Unfortunately, politicians and criminals alike do not like his diligence, and talk about transferring him to Kashmir, where he will be killed in an encounter by a terrorist. Bhagat also comes in touch with suspended Police Inspector Sukhdev Singh, and gangleader, Rajnath Guru, the son of a freedom-fighter, Dinanathji (Aloknath). (Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Chanddi
programme.desc: Two righteous sisters, a lawyer and a police inspector, challenge a local politician. But problems follow when the corrupt minister decides to seek revenge. (Action)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Consumer)
